itinerary.Day 1: Arrival in Cochin - Transfer to Munnar. Scenic drive with lush greenery and tea plantations. Visit Cheeyappara & Valara waterfalls, Karadipara viewpoint, Blossom Park.
itinerary.Day 2: Munnar Exploration - Full-day sightseeing: Eravikulam National Park, Mattupetty Dam, Anamudi Peak, Pothamedu Viewpoint, Tea Museum, Rose Garden.
itinerary.Day 3: Munnar to Alleppey - Scenic drive. Houseboat check-in, cruise through backwaters and canals. Enjoy meals on board with sunset views.
itinerary.Day 4: Alleppey to Cochin - Checkout from houseboat, transfer to Cochin for departure.

itinerary.Day 1: Arrival in Cochin - Transfer to Alleppey Houseboat. Enjoy backwaters and overnight stay on the houseboat.
itinerary.Day 2: Alleppey to Thekkady. Visit Periyar National Park and optional activities like boating.
itinerary.Day 3: Thekkady to Munnar. En route, visit Lockhart Tea Factory, Anayirangal Lake, and Lockhart Gap View.
itinerary.Day 4: Munnar Exploration - Tea Gardens, Mattupetty Dam, Echo Point, and local market stroll.
itinerary.Day 5: Munnar to Rameswaram. Visit temples and local attractions.
itinerary.Day 6: Rameswaram to Kanyakumari. Sightseeing and enjoy the sunset.
itinerary.Day 7: Kanyakumari to Kovalam. Relax on the beach and later transfer to Trivandrum for departure.
